thread.title: Social Selling and how to make money using social media networks. ClubsCorp Conference Call
thread.title_full: Social Selling and how to make money using social media networks. ClubsCorp Conference Call | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Social Selling and how to make money using social media networks. ClubsCorp Conference Call
text:
(MENAFN Press) (Dallas Texas) ClubsCorp Communications Inc. and ClubsCorp Business Link today announce that the company will hold its weekly Conference Call Updates on:
 
WEEKLY CLUBSCORP CONFERENCE UPDATE
Tuesday September 1 2015
4:00 PM CST
(712) 775-7085
Participant Code: 213800

This week's topic:   "Social Selling" and how to make money using social media networks.  
Social networking is the top online activity in the US with the average American spending 37 minutes per day.  46% of web users look towards social media when making a purchase.  8 out of 10 Small Businesses use social media for their business to drive growth.  70% of business-to-consumer marketers have acquired customers through Facebook Twitter and YouTube. 
Crowdfunding in 2012 using generated 2.7 billion in capital for businesses and the number grew to 5.1 billion in 2013

Conference Call:
To listen to the conference call dial in approximately 5 minutes before the schedule call to (712) 775-7085 and dial the participant code 213800.  A replay of the conference call will be available after the end of conference call at http://clubscorp.podbean.com. This is a free service provided by ClubsCorp Communications Inc.
 
 
For more information visit www.ClubsCorp.com
 
ABOUT ClubsCorp and ClubsCorp Communications Inc.
CLUBSCORP Communications Inc. (“3ci”) is a communications business media and financial events holding company focusing on developing exclusive membership-chapter communities within the financial industry. These communities are comprised of Wall Street professionals CLUBSCORP Business Link Members (individual accredited investors) executives of private and publicly traded companies and other related professionals and businesses that make up the financial industry. 
CLUBSCORP Business Link is a platform allowing its members to connect both online through their online social business connections as well as in person at membership-chapter luncheons all-day conferences and offshore financial events.


About PRBuzz.com 
PRBuzz.com is a press release distribution service that distributes press releases to online news sites and blogs to help customers with search engine optimization and create buzz about their web site, news or business.
